sentences.sContent: Designed as cruisers, many ketches are heavier, more stable in sea conditions, and more commodious down below.
sentences.sContent_eng: Designed as cruisers, many ketches are heavier, more stable in sea conditions, and more commodious down below.
sentences.sCn: 因为它们生来就是为了远行之用，因此它们通常更重，在各种海洋状况下更稳定， 船舱也更宽敞。

sentences.sContent: “The Coffee houses particularly are very commodious for a free Conversation, and for reading at an easie Rate all manner of printed News,” noted one observer.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The Coffee houses particularly are very commodious for a free Conversation, and for reading at an easie Rate all manner of printed News,” noted one observer.
sentences.sCn: “尤其是咖啡馆，是一个非常宽敞的自由交谈之处，来阅读与评论形形色色的印刷新闻”，一个观察员指出。

sentences.sContent: “The Coffee houses particularly are very commodious for a free Conversation, and for reading at an easie Rate all manner of printed News,” noted one observer.
sentences.sContent_eng: “The Coffee houses particularly are very commodious for a free Conversation, and for reading at an easie Rate all manner of printed News,” noted one observer.
sentences.sCn: 一名观察家说，“尤其是咖啡馆，因其宽敞开阔的空间，很适合人们进行自由交谈，还可以舒舒服服的阅读各种新闻印刷品”。

remMethod.val: com + mod(=code方式， 范围) + ious → 大的范围 → 宽敞的

trans.tranOther: a house or room that is commodious is very big
